eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: PauseOverlay
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: An overlay object that automatically moves/stretches itself to fill the screen when the game is paused.
description: An overlay object that automatically moves/stretches itself to fill the screen when the game is paused. Use the Pause and Unpause actions to pause the entire game, base layer, or other specific layers.

Pausing the entire game will set the game timescale to 0, which will prevent any tweens/transitions/effects from taking place, and so the overlay appears instantly instead of tweening onto the screen.

Pausing a specific layer will set its layer timescale to 0, allowing tweens and animations to play on other layers. Use the Pause base layer action, with the overlay set to another layer, in order to allow tweening and effects to play.

eventsFunctions.description: Create/Show the PauseScreen object on a layer and pause the entire game. (Includes timers and animations across all layers.)
eventsFunctions.name: Pause_Game
eventsFunctions.sentence: Pause the entire game with _PARAM1_ on the layer _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Remove the PauseScreen object and set the timescale of the game to 1.
eventsFunctions.name: Unpause_Game

eventsFunctions.description: Create/Show the PauseScreen object on a layer and pause the base layer of the game.
eventsFunctions.name: Pause_Baselayer
eventsFunctions.sentence: Pause the base layer with _PARAM1_ on the layer _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Remove the PauseScreen object and set the timescale of the base layer to 1.
eventsFunctions.name: Unpause_Baselayer
eventsFunctions.sentence: Unpause the base layer and hide _PARAM1_

eventsFunctions.description: Set the timescale of a layer to 0.
eventsFunctions.name: Pause_ExtraLayer

eventsFunctions.description: Set the timescale of a layer to back to 1.
eventsFunctions.name: Unpause_ExtraLayer

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the base layer is paused.
eventsFunctions.name: IsGamePaused

eventsFunctions.description: Forces the tween effects to end immediately to prevent issues on paused layers
eventsFunctions.name: ForceShorterTween
eventsFunctions.sentence: force the tweens of _PARAM0_ to end

eventsFunctions.description: Change if force the tweens to end. Forces the tween effects to end immediately to prevent issues on paused layers

propertyDescriptors.label: Tween in/out the pause overlay
propertyDescriptors.description: Set to False if PauseOverlay is created on the Base layer, or if the entire game is paused

propertyDescriptors.label: Force the tweens to end

propertyDescriptors.name: ForceShorterTween
